review: There is only one thing I am dissapointed about Fire TV stick: The Fire Tv remote app is not available in Mexico ,my country. I hope you make it availble for everyone soon.

review: Very easy to set-up and use.

review: Works great so happy with this..

review: Have to re boot it all the time... Videos freeze constantly

review: Easy installation.  Good assortment of movies. Movies stream smoothly to the TV.  After using the Fire Stick for a month, I am very pleased with it.
author: Gene Lalicker

review: It has a lot of choices for apps you can watch but not all the good ones.  I really wanted to watch my cbs subscription on it but it wasnt a choice.  I joined amazon prime but it is too expensive to watch anything on there.  I decided to go back to cable.
author: Elizabeth

review: I don't have an hdmi receiver so the picture isn't very clear
author: Dominic

review: It's easy to use, I thought it was going to be one of those 'advanced technology' gadgets that's hard to figure out even after reading and following all the instructions. I wish I had it before now. Thanks!
author: Sylvia Macias

review: Love it, so easy to use!
